merge_style.description: The merge method to use. Can be one of: `merge`, `squash`, `rebase`

priority.description: Priority of this issue. Can be one of: `p0`, `p1`, `p2`, `p3`, `""`.

state.description: State of this issue. Either `open` or `closed`.

color.description: The hexadecimal color code for the label, without the leading `#`.

state.description: State of this Pull Request. Either `open` or `closed`.

encoding.description: 当前编码只支持 `"utf-8"` and `"base64"` 。默认: `utf-8`

priority.description: Priority of this issue. Can be one of: `p0`, `p1`, `p2`, `p3`, `""`.

color.description: The hexadecimal color code for the label, without the leading `#`.

subject_type.description: can be one of: line, file

alias.description: Alias usable alias to be used for the chart

condition.description: A yaml path that resolves to a boolean, used for enabling/disabling charts (e.g. subchart1.enabled )

enabled.description: Enabled bool determines if chart should be loaded

import-values.description:
ImportValues holds the mapping of source values to parent key to be imported. Each item can be a
string or pair of child/parent sublist items.

name.description:
Name is the name of the dependency.

This must mach the name in the dependency's Chart.yaml.

repository.description:
The URL to the repository.

Appending `index.yaml` to this string should result in a URL that can be
used to fetch the repository index.

tags.description: Tags can be used to group charts for enabling/disabling together

version.description:
Version is the version (range) of this chart.

A lock file will always produce a single version, while a dependency
may contain a semantic version range.

email.description: Email is an optional email address to contact the named maintainer

name.description: Name is a user name or organization name

url.description: URL is an optional URL to an address for the named maintainer

annotations.description:
Annotations are additional mappings uninterpreted by Helm,
made available for inspection by other applications.

apiVersion.description: The API Version of this chart. Required.

appVersion.description: The version of the application enclosed inside of this chart.

condition.description: The condition to check to enable chart

dependencies.description: Dependencies are a list of dependencies for a chart.

deprecated.description: Whether or not this chart is deprecated

description.description: A one-sentence description of the chart

home.description: The URL to a relevant project page, git repo, or contact person

icon.description: The URL to an icon file.

kubeVersion.description: KubeVersion is a SemVer constraint specifying the version of Kubernetes required.

maintainers.description: A list of name and URL/email address combinations for the maintainer(s)

name.description: The name of the chart. Required.

sources.description: Source is the URL to the source code of this chart

tags.description: The tags to check to enable chart

type.description: Specifies the chart type: application or library

version.description: A SemVer 2 conformant version string of the chart. Required.

valid.description: Valid is true if Time is not NULL

token_id.description: id 的 string 格式，用于兼容前端 int64 支持

valid_cr_count.description: 有效cr数，代码评审通过且对应的pr被合入

valid_pr_count.description: 有效pr数，已被合入，且pr具有至少一个已通过的代码评审

detail.description: 公仓转私仓或仓库被删除后为 null

exposed_repo_path.description: activity 发生时仓库的 path，这时的 path 是可以公开的

repo_unaccessible.description: 仓库是否不可访问（公仓转私仓或仓库被删除后不可访问）

detail.description: 组织详情，组织被删后为 null

remark.description: 组织别名，组织被删除后才有值

detail.description: 公仓转私仓或仓库被删除后为 null

exposed_repo_path.description: activity 发生时仓库的 path，这时的 path 是可以公开的

repo_unaccessible.description: 仓库是否不可访问（公仓转私仓或仓库被删除后不可访问）

appreciate_status.description: 用户赞赏码状态，0-无赞赏码，1-有

origin_path.description: 来源地址，例如 release 附件的来源地址是对应的 release 页面。issue和pr文件没有。

status.description: 预算单状态，1-正常，2-隔离，3-销毁

init.description: 当前仓库是否已经有构建记录，1 表示有构建记录，0 表示没有构建记录

bind_domain.description: BindDomain 根组织绑定的域名

last_update_username.description: 最新代码更新人账户名

email_verification.description: 组织限制指定邮箱认证才能加入

group_protection.description: 组织保护开关，0 - 关闭，1 - 打开

hide_members.description: 是否对外隐藏组织成员，0 - 否, 1 - 是

hide_sub_groups.description: 是否对外隐藏子组织，0 - 否, 1 - 是

show_private_repo_watermark.description: 是否对外显示私有仓库水印，0 - 否, 1 - 是

values.description: SettingValue 组织设置值，多个选项，用逗号拼接。可选值来自 SettingNamesArray 的值，e.g. disable_organization_readme,cloud_native_dev_only

push_time.description:
The push time of the artifact inside the repository
Format: date-time

pusher_id.description: The ID of the pusher who push the artifact.

recent_pull_count.description: The count that the artifact inside the repository recent pulled

annotations.description: Annotations contains arbitrary metadata for the image manifest.

artifactType.description: ArtifactType specifies the IANA media type of artifact when the manifest is used for an artifact.

config.description:
Config references a configuration object for a container, by digest.
The referenced configuration object is a JSON blob that the runtime uses to set up the container.

layers.description: Layers is an indexed list of layers referenced by the manifest.

mediaType.description: MediaType specifies the type of this document data structure e.g. `application/vnd.oci.image.manifest.v1+json`

schemaVersion.description: SchemaVersion is the image manifest schema that this image follows

subject.description: Subject is an optional link from the image manifest to another manifest forming an association between the image manifest and the other manifest.

access_role.description: AccessRole 用户在当前资源的最大权限

can_show_members.description: 上级group设置了hide_members为1，则下级都不能显示

can_show_sub_groups.description: 上级group设置了hide_sub_groups为1，则下级都不能显示

hide_members.description: 是否对外隐藏组织成员，0 - 否, 1 - 是

hide_sub_groups.description: 是否对外隐藏子组织，0 - 否, 1 - 是

stages.description: 流水线各 stage 的状态

hard.description: The hard limits of the quota,example: { "hard": { "storage": -1}}
The hard limits of the quota,example: { "hard": { "storage": -1}}

repository_name.description: The repository name of the quota

used.description: The used limits of the quota,example: { "used": { "storage": 0}}

last_update_username.description: 最新代码更新人账户名
最新代码更新人账户名
最新代码更新人账户名

branch.description: 触发分支，默认为主分支

config.description: 指定配置文件内容，yaml 格式

event.description: 事件名，必须是 api_trigger 或以 api_trigger_ 开头，默认为 `api_trigger`

sha.description: commit id ，优先级比 tag 高，默认为分支最新提交记录

sync.description: 是否等待构建正式触发，为false时会立刻返回 sn 和 buildLogUrl

tag.description: 触发 tag，优先级比 branch 高

budget_status.description: 预算单状态，0-没有预算单，1-正常，2-欠费被隔离，3-被销毁

threshold.description: 对应资源类型阈值状态

token.description: 后续调用 confirm 接口用的

email.description: Email 用户git提交邮箱，是 emails 里面的某一个

system_email_contact.description: 系统默认邮箱是否可以通知

appreciate_status.description: 用户赞赏码状态，0-无赞赏码，1-有
用户赞赏码状态，0-无赞赏码，1-有

pipelineId.description: 创建环境的流水线 id

code.description: 返回码，0 表示成功，1 表示失败

cursor.description: Cursor 客户端 remote-ssh 访问 schema 地址

vscode.description: VSCode 客户端 remote-ssh 访问 schema 地址

duration.description: 开发环境持续时间，单位：ms（非实时更新）

file_list.description: 备份的文件列表，仅前五个备份文件相对路径

latest_sha.description: 环境销毁时远程最新的 commit short hash

pipeline_id.description: 创建环境的子流水线 id

restore_id.description: 恢复备份代码的流水线 id，如果有值表示备份代码已被恢复（重建环境时会恢复备份代码）

sn.description: 创建开发环境的流水线 sn

ssh.description: 开发环境是否支持 ssh 链接

status.description: 工作区状态，running: 开发环境已启动，closed：开发环境已关闭

workspace.description: 开发环境默认工作区路径

hasMore.description: 开发环境状态，running: 开发环境已启动，closed：开发环境已关闭

list.description: 查询开始时间，格式：YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ssZZ，例如：2024-12-01 00:00:00+0800

pageInfo.description: 查询结束时间，格式：YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ssZZ，例如：2024-12-01 00:00:00+0800

priority.description: p0, p1, p2, p3, ""。 single choice。
p0, p1, p2, p3, ""。 single choice。

annotations.description: Annotations contains arbitrary metadata relating to the targeted content.

artifactType.description: ArtifactType is the IANA media type of this artifact.

data.description:
Data is an embedding of the targeted content. This is encoded as a base64
string when marshalled to JSON (automatically, by encoding/json). If
present, Data can be used directly to avoid fetching the targeted content.

digest.description: Digest is the digest of the targeted content.

mediaType.description: MediaType is the media type of the object this schema refers to.

platform.description:
Platform describes the platform which the image in the manifest runs on.

This should only be used when referring to a manifest.

size.description: Size specifies the size in bytes of the blob.

urls.description: URLs specifies a list of URLs from which this object MAY be downloaded

architecture.description:
Architecture field specifies the CPU architecture, for example
`amd64` or `ppc64le`.

os.description: OS specifies the operating system, for example `linux` or `windows`.

os.features.description:
OSFeatures is an optional field specifying an array of strings,
each listing a required OS feature (for example on Windows `win32k`).

os.version.description:
OSVersion is an optional field specifying the operating system
version, for example on Windows `10.0.14393.1066`.

variant.description:
Variant is an optional field specifying a variant of the CPU, for
example `v7` to specify ARMv7 when architecture is `arm`.

armoredPublicKey.description: A GPG public key in ASCII-armored format.

name.description: A descriptive name for the new key.

state.description: 问题状态 开启/忽略
问题状态 开启/忽略

weeks.description: 贡献者以周为单位的提交趋势数据

is_protected.description: 如果当前访问的是分支，那么表示是否是保护分支

subkeys.description: 子密钥指纹，当为 primary key 时与 primary_fingerprint 相同

created_at.description: 子密钥系统创建时间（添加到系统时间）

with_line_counts.description: 是否统计增删的行数, 默认总提交超过 10000 的仓库不统计

is_protected.description: 如果当前访问的是分支，那么表示是否是保护分支

subject_type.description: can be one of: line, file

maxDaysOptions.description: 用户登陆过期天数可选项

get.description:
访问令牌调用此接口需包含以下权限。Required permissions for access token. 
group-manage:r
get.summary: 获取指定组织或仓库内, 访问成员在当前层级内的权限信息。Get permission information for accessing members at current level.

parameters.description: 是否包含继承的权限。If inherited permissions are included.
parameters.name: include_inherit

get.description:
访问令牌调用此接口需包含以下权限。Required permissions for access token. 
group-manage:r
get.summary: 获取指定组织或仓库内指定成员的权限信息, 结果按组织层级来展示, 包含上层组织的权限继承信息。Get specified member's permissions with organizational hierarchy.

get.description:
访问令牌调用此接口需包含以下权限。Required permissions for access token. 
repo-manage:r
get.summary: 获取指定组织或仓库内, 访问成员在当前层级内的权限信息。Get permission information for accessing members at current level.

parameters.description: 是否包含继承的权限。If inherited permissions are included.
parameters.name: include_inherit

get.description:
访问令牌调用此接口需包含以下权限。Required permissions for access token. 
repo-manage:r
get.summary: 获取指定组织或仓库内指定成员的权限信息, 结果按组织层级来展示, 包含上层组织的权限继承信息。Get specified member's permissions with organizational hierarchy.
